T02TD2004E:212a-0: @212a // da ni drag po'i bsam gtan gyi las bshad de /
T02TD2004E:212a-1: de la dang po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po snga ma bzhin du bskyed de /
T02TD2004E:212a-2: mchod pa dang gtor ma bsngos te /
T02TD2004E:212a-3: sngon du bsgrub bya rlung nag po'i steng na /
T02TD2004E:212a-4: me smug nag 'bar ba'i dkyil na gos dang bral ba /
T02TD2004E:212a-6: yan lag lcags kyis thag pas bcings pa /
T02TD2004E:212a-7: skra nag pa mes bsregs pa bzhin du gnas pa la /
T02TD2004E:212b-0: bdag gi thugs ka nas srin po @212b rab tu rngam pa dang /
T02TD2004E:212b-1: khra dang 'ug pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2004E:212b-3: ce sbyang la sogs pa za zhing /
T02TD2004E:212b-5: nang khrol nam mkha' la kun du khyer bar bsgoms na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2004E:212b-6: bsam gtan gyi las rdzogs so /
T02TD2004E:212b-8: // / de nas las kyi kha bskang bar byas te /
T02TD2004E:212b-9: mchod pa dang sbyin sreg dang so sor bshags pa'i mdo gdon pa dang /
T02TD2004E:212b-11: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi drag po'i las kyi bya ba bdun pa dang /
T02TD2004E:212b-12: ram pa bzhin du bya ba'i cho ga /
T02TD2004E:212b-13: dpal au rgyan yul du 'dug pa /
T02TD2004E:212b-14: dregs pa can 'dul ba'i thabs nyi tshe ba /
T02TD2004E:212b-15: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas /
T02TD2004E:212b-20: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni //
T02TD2004E:212b-21: las kyi grogs kyis byed pa ste //
T02TD2004E:212b-22: zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin //
T02TD2004E:212b-23: rgyas pa de bzhin mig tu bsgrags //
T02TD2004E:212b-24: dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste //
T02TD2004E:212b-25: dbang du bya ba rig byed yin //
T02TD2004E:212b-26: dgug pa yid las de bzhin mda' //
T02TD2004E:212b-27: bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po bzhin //
T02TD2004E:212b-28: mnan pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yis //
T02TD2004E:212b-29: gsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod //
T02TD2004E:212b-30: las rnams de dag re re yang //
T02TD2004E:212b-31: 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste //
T02TD2004E:212b-32: nyi ma gnyis par gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD2004E:212b-33: gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad //
T02TD2004E:212b-34: bzhi pa sbyin sreg 'chang bar bya //
T02TD2004E:212b-35: lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2004E:212b-36: drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya //
T02TD2004E:212b-37: bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskang //
T02TD2004E:212b-38: grangs kyi las la khyad par du //
T02TD2004E:212b-39: las kyi gtsor ni gang bsgrub de'i //
T02TD2004E:212b-40: 'khor lo skor ba nyi ma bzhi //
T02TD2004E:212b-41: las kyi bye brag 'di shes na //
T02TD2004E:212b-42: zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob //
T02TD2004E:212b-43: rgyas pas yon tan drug dang 'byor //
T02TD2004E:212b-44: dbang gis mos pa rnams bzhir bsgyur //
T02TD2004E:212b-45: dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed //
T02TD2004E:212b-46: mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed //
T02TD2004E:212b-47: gzhan yang ji ltar de bzhin du //
T02TD2004E:212b-48: sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la //
T02TD2004E:212b-49: dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste //
T02TD2004E:212b-50: gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam //
T02TD2004E:212b-51: bsam par 'gyur ram dad pa nyams //
T02TD2004E:212b-52: de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang //
T02TD2004E:212b-53: phyir bzlog 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2004E:212b-54: dad pa brtan par bsgrubs pas na //
T02TD2004E:212b-55: nam mkha' med par gyur na yang //
T02TD2004E:212b-56: sngags kyi dngos grub med med srid //
T02TD2004E:213a-0: @213a * // lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i //
T02TD2004E:213a-1: rig sngags slu ba mi srid na //
T02TD2004E:213a-2: 'dod chags bral ba bshad pa yis //
T02TD2004E:213a-3: gsang sngags sbyor bas slu ba ni //
T02TD2004E:213a-5: chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
T02TD2004E:213a-6: don la the tshom med pa yis //
T02TD2004E:213a-7: mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye //
T02TD2004E:213a-8: rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge pa //
T02TD2004E:213a-9: de la bsgrub pa'i dngos grub ring //
T02TD2004E:213a-10: man ngag dam pa bstan byas kyang //
T02TD2004E:213a-11: slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na //
T02TD2004E:213a-12: de la dngos grub ring bar bshad //
T02TD2004E:213a-13: bla mas man ngag sbas byas kyang //
T02TD2004E:213a-14: slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing //
T02TD2004E:213a-15: bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes //
T02TD2004E:213a-16: gces spras byas na 'grub par nges //
T02TD2004E:213a-17: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
T02TD2004E:213a-18: rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2004E:213a-19: bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces //
T02TD2004E:213a-20: rang gi yid pas nus mthu che //
T02TD2004E:213a-21: gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med //
T02TD2004E:213a-22: yon tan phul ba byas pas ni ;
T02TD2004E:213a-23: / rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur //
T02TD2004E:213a-24: rin chen gnyis las grub par 'byung //
T02TD2004E:213a-25: dkon par gyur na sngags pa brjod //
T02TD2004E:213a-27: bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na //
T02TD2004E:213a-28: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang //
T02TD2004E:213a-29: gang gis bsngags pa ma byas na ;
T02TD2004E:213a-30: / de la 'dod na mi ster ro //
T02TD2004E:213a-31: dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos //
T02TD2004E:213a-32: dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma //
T02TD2004E:213a-33: dad pa bla ma dad pa pha //
T02TD2004E:213a-34: dad pa lam chen dad pa gru //
T02TD2004E:213a-35: dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //
T02TD2004E:213a-36: dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid //
T02TD2004E:213a-37: dad pa bsod nams nor yin te //
T02TD2004E:213a-38: de yi phyir na sngags pa yis //
T02TD2004E:213a-39: rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2004E:213a-40: gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bskur //
